text: Seema G. Nair is an Indian actress who appears in Malayalam films and Malayalam TV series. Both Nair and her mother Cherthala Sumathi won the Kerala State Amateur Drama Award. == Awards and Recognations == * 2021 - Mother Teresa Award == References == == Other websites == * * * Seema G Nair at MSI * https://web.archive.org/web/20140304033848/http://www.metromatinee.com/artist/Seema%20G%20Nair-900 Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Actors from Kerala Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Seema G. Nair
